about_the_game:
After the two office workers, the bearded dragon Beardford and the samoyed dog Hounderick, pick a fight with a gang in a junkyard after work, they unwillingly discover that there's a place full of dangerous animals they had never seen before in their peaceful city.

features:

  • Giant cities to search through trash, random wooden boxes lying around, or maybe a stranger's house, to find useful things to mercilessly beat up your enemies in turn-based combat.
  • An optional bug catching minigame to get even more items that make your enemies beg at your feet.
  • Unique NPCs complaining about things at daytime and nighttime.
  • Threatening delinquents.
  • Completing quests that are mostly from animals that have no friends.
  • An achievement for sitting on a chair.
  • Talking fish.

name: Animalistic Worlds Demo
short_description: Open-World RPG taking place in a world where anthropomorphic animals try to live like humans used to in modern society, but often fail miserably due to their animal instincts.
